title: Poster, Lectures and Exhibitions, Columbia University Graduate School of Architecture and Drawing, ca. 1975
title_raw: Lectures and Exhibitions, Columbia University Graduate School of Architecture and Drawing
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted along right edge: Keith Goddard / Works
inscribed: Top left: LECTURES AND / EXHIBITIONS /COLUMBIA / UNIVERSITY / GRADUATE / SCHOOL OF / ARCHITECTURE / AND DRAWING.  At upper right in green: SPRING / 1975 / FALL / 1975 / SPRING / 1976 / FALL / 1976
description: A calendar of spring and fall lectures and exhibitions organized into two columns printed in silver, blue and green.  A large purple arrow points to upper right corner which dissolves into blue dots. The lectures are arranged in the left column and the right is reserved for exhibitions. The text is printed in large letters that gradually change from silver to green, moving from left to right. See notes for list of lecturers and exhibitions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Lectures and Exhibitions, Columbia University Graduate School of Architecture and Drawing, ca. 1975. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-213
